metadata.Title: CVE-2017-6815 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium.
metadata.Description:
In WordPress before 4.7.3 (wp-includes/pluggable.php), control characters can trick redirect URL validation.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-6815` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

wordpress - 4.7.3+dfsg-1
wordpress-l10n - 4.7.3+dfsg-1
wordpress-theme-twentynineteen - 4.7.3+dfsg-1
wordpress-theme-twentyseventeen - 4.7.3+dfsg-1
wordpress-theme-twentysixteen - 4.7.3+dfsg-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: wordpress package in focal, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4.7.3+dfsg-1').
